name: Runner (itch) (Urutau Dev Studios)
description:
This is a small project made for my first Game Jam. The objective of the game is basically to jump over obstacles and pick up the fruits that appear along the way and with that score points. Please leave your comments if you have some issues to help me improve my project. Game Play link: Keyboards:

  • Space = Jump;
  • Esc = Pause Game;
